WindowWebkitConvertPointFromNodeToPage.summary:
Given a specified in a particular DOM 's
coordinate system, the method
convertPointFromNodeToPage() returns a Point
which specifies the same position in the page's coordinate system. This method is
non-standard and should not be used.

blockquote.para:
Warning: Please review the Browser compatibility section before using this method,
as it's not widely supported (nor is the object it uses).

WindowWebkitConvertPointFromNodeToPage.returns: A object specifying a point in the page's coordinate system.
